hero.title:
Find the perfect tutor
and schedule classes easily
hero.description:
Our platform connects tutors with students,
offering intelligent scheduling,
calendar synchronization and automatic conflict resolution,
making learning enjoyable, efficient and always on time.

features.title: Why choose EduScheduler?
features.description: Our platform offers everything you need for effective learning and teaching

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
smartScheduling.description: Automatic resolution of time conflicts and synchronization with Google, Outlook and Apple calendars.

tutorSearch.title: Tutor Search
tutorSearch.description: Find the perfect teacher based on subject, location, ratings and availability.

ratingSystem.title: Rating & Review System
ratingSystem.description: Read reviews from other students and leave your rating after completed classes.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Receive reminders about upcoming classes and important deadlines.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Direct contact with the tutor through the built-in messaging system.

progressStats.title: Progress Statistics
progressStats.description: Track your achievements and learning progress with detailed reports.
